TopicTitle: Laythecat is bestcat. (Chobit's house of madness) The one thread to rule them all!

Articles.Content: Or just post enough so it gets off the page
But what shall we post?
Not having things to post has never stopped this thread before...
We did have some vague grasp of a topic to talk about. But that always spun off into new ones. Like browsing the internet.
Trying to have a rational conversation on this thread is like trying to look up only one thing on TvTropes. It just don't work that way...
Yup. Now, CAAAAAAAAAAKE
Not TvTropes!!!! You people introduced me to that recently and I have lots of exams!!! Why!!!! Why!!!!!
This thread moves too quickly for me to adequately respond to anything
You have to take the time to read the previous posts then respond to them and the new posts that were posted while you were looking at posts. But there isn't too many new posts here.

This thread moves too quickly for me to adequately respond to anything

*trollface*

Not TvTropes!!!! You people introduced me to that recently and I have lots of exams!!! Why!!!! Why!!!!!

So that later in life, you can do the same to other people who have exams. It's the circle of life...

Also, hi Chobit!

Edited May 21, 2013 by Trekkette
Until we finally do away with the idea of exams...

This thread really is again going quite fast.

No wonder you guys managed to get the counting thread to recordbreaking levels before the plug got pulled. Nobody is reading the posts above them.

Like I said last night, take it easy. We've got all night.

And assuming you correctly guessed the question I was going to ask, I'll have to make you an offer you can't refuse.

The question then becomes what would that be.
Prepare for THE BEST MUSIC EVER.

And both threads are/were frequented by me. I'm starting to see a pattern...

At least a comment by me can stop any conversation till people make a detour around it.

Such as this post.

Edited May 21, 2013 by LeonG17

So how about them Stoats?

Victory or extinction?
If any attack chobit's poultry again, worldwide extinction.

If any attack chobit's poultry again, worldwide extinction.

Agreed. I say we build the CPDS (Chobit's Poultry Defense System).
What would it consist of?
Lasers. Big guns. Nukes.
But that would cause collateral damage which would kill chobit's poultry leading to our painful and slow deaths.
Precision laser turrets. Guards with handguns. A jeep.
We would need to clear the perimeter round the poultry area so the stoats have to run across the "no-mans" land with no cover so we have clear fields of fire.

We would need to clear the perimeter round the poultry area so the stoats have to run across the "no-mans" land with no cover so we have clear fields of fire.

Good plan. *starts construction*

Here is my 11th Orbital Defense Fleet.

453x "Orion" Heavy Assault Battecruisers.

782x "Akoosta XXVII"-class Orbital Heavy Defense Satellite Ion Cannons.

2738x "Roomba"-class Light Destroyers

2031x "Sightseerer"-class Recon Assault Ship

817x "Twoguns"-class Heavy Battleship.

282x "United States"-class Heavy Dreadnoughts with Nuclear-Pulse-Propulsion.

231x "Chobit"-class Heavy Frigates

788,727x "Ordance"-class Heavy Fighters

75x "Voyager"-class Survey/Colony Ships

29,291x "Commander"-class Heavy Shuttles

261x "HDL"-class Planetary Defense Lazers.

11x "Yamoto"-class Heavy Attack Battlecruisers

Lets see how well stoats fight against Rods of Gods, Red/Dark Matter, Anti-Matter Bombs, Super-Heated Plasma, Lazers, Railguns, and Destructive Force-Fields. Bring it on!
